players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
You: "I saw Bob last night, he seemed fine. I didn't see anyone suspicious near him."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. I'm not guilty of his death."
Diana: "I am the detective and I have evidence that Charlie is the mafioso. However, he knows I'm on to him."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie

players.name: Charlie

players.name: Diana
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Alice: "I saw Bob last night, he seemed fine. I didn't see anyone suspicious near him."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. I'm not guilty of his death."
